::: {.cell}

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: T4.3.web.orig v1.0.


> Terrestrial ecoregions containing major or minor occurrences of this ecosystem functional group were identified by consulting available ecoregion descriptions (Dinerstein et al. 2017), global and regional reviews, national and regional ecosystem maps, locations of relevant examples, and proofed by expert reviewers. Consequently they are coarse-scale indicative representations of distribution, except where they occupy small ecoregions. Ecoregions were mapped at 30 arc second spatial resolution..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- GitHub repository ([GeoJSON / TopoJSON versions in GitHUB](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/T4.3.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091023))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**T4.3 Hummock savannas**](/efg-info/T4_3.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Web navigation (**code: T4.3.web.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T4.3.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

T4.3.web.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T4.3.web.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091023) :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/T4.3.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [GitHub repository](layers/T4.3.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/) :: [GitHub repository](T4.3.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json)
T4.3.WM.nwx (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T4.3.WM.nwx_v1.0.tif) :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T4_3_WM_nwx)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
